title: The Dreaded Naj is BACK!!!
content:
Well... it's a new year, so I asked to have my posting limit removed!!!

"I'm back" -- Duke Nukem

I am going to try posting as a respossible member, and the admins can always throw the noose over me if I flub up to much.

So, are you happy???

PCKF: [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

(Aww... Look at them; they miss my Role Plays!!!)

jk...Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!

Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --
